name: Schneider Electric Modicon Controllers输入验证错误漏洞
product: ["Schneider Electric Modicon ControllersM241/M251 <5.3.12.51", "Schneider Electric Modicon Controllers M258 /LMC058 null"]
description: Schneider Electric Modicon Controllers是法国施耐德电气（Schneider Electric）公司的一系列Modicon系列可编程逻辑控制器。Schneider Electric Modicon Controllers存在输入验证错误漏洞，该漏洞源于输入验证不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致拒绝服务。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://www.se.com/ww/en/work/support/cybersecurity/security-notifications.jsp
patch: Schneider Electric Modicon Controllers输入验证错误漏洞的补丁
